message: This seems like a fair starting point, Bob. I'm happy to negotiate further if you think it's not equitable.
I think I can do better than that. Your turn to counter!
Let's be reasonable, Bob. We both need to get something here, and this offer is much fairer than your last one. Think about it!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need a better deal. Your turn to sweeten the pot!
I'm willing to split it more evenly now, Bob. We only have a few rounds left. Let's reach a compromise and both walk away with a decent share.
I'm not convinced yet, Alice. You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. Let's keep negotiating!
